Package net.tangly.commons.lang.functional

package net.tangly.commons.lang.functional
The package provides functional abstractions still missing in the official standard API of Java.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    net.tangly.commons.lang
    A collection of abstractions and utility functions missing in the standard java API.
    net.tangly.commons.lang.exceptions

    Defines a typed pair as long as JDK API is not providing the abstraction.
    RecursiveCall<T>
    An alternative approach to recursion is using an infinite Stream pipeline with the recursive call wrapped in a functional interface.

    TriConsumer<T,U,V>
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
    TriFunction<T,U,V,R>
    Represent a function that accepts three arguments and produces a result.
    Try<T>
